description.en: An introduction to God’s character as the foundation of all truth, revealing who God is and how His nature shapes faith and life.
description.sw: Utangulizi wa tabia ya Mungu kama msingi wa ukweli wote, ukifunua Mungu ni nani na jinsi tabia yake inavyojenga imani na maisha.

en: God’s character is the foundation of all truth
God is unchanging, holy, just, and merciful
Understanding God shapes how we understand Scripture and life
sw: Tabia ya Mungu ni msingi wa ukweli wote
Mungu habadiliki, ni mtakatifu, mwenye haki na rehema
Kumjua Mungu kunaunda uelewa wetu wa Maandiko na maisha

description.en: A study revealing love as God’s very nature, not merely His actions.
description.sw: Somo linalofunua kwamba upendo ni asili ya Mungu, si tendo lake tu.

en: God’s love is unconditional and sacrificial
True love flows from knowing God
sw: Upendo wa Mungu hauna masharti na ni wa kujitoa
Upendo wa kweli unatoka katika kumjua Mungu

description.en: An explanation of God’s law as a reflection of His loving character.
description.sw: Ufafanuzi wa sheria ya Mungu kama kielelezo cha tabia yake ya upendo.

en: God’s law reflects His character of love
Obedience is an expression of love
sw: Sheria ya Mungu inaakisi tabia yake ya upendo

description.en: A biblical explanation of sin as rebellion against God’s law and character of love.
description.sw: Maelezo ya kibiblia ya dhambi kama uasi dhidi ya sheria na tabia ya Mungu ya upendo.

en: Sin is transgression of God’s law
Sin leads to separation and death
sw: Dhambi ni kuvunja sheria ya Mungu

description.en: A clear explanation of the cross as the meeting point of God’s justice and mercy.
description.sw: Ufafanuzi wa msalaba kama mahali ambapo haki na rehema ya Mungu hukutana.

en: The cross reveals God’s love and justice
Christ bore the penalty of sin
Salvation is a gift through sacrifice
sw: Msalaba unaonyesha upendo na haki ya Mungu

description.en: A study showing that eternal life begins now through a daily relationship with God.
description.sw: Somo linaloonyesha kuwa uzima wa milele unaanza sasa kupitia uhusiano wa kila siku na Mungu.

sw: Uzima wa milele ni kumjua Mungu
Ushirika wa kila siku huimarisha maisha ya kiroho
